newsitem.title: USA: Noble Affiliates oil, natgas production up.
newsitem.headline: Noble Affiliates oil, natgas production up.

text.p: Noble Affiliates Inc said on Tuesday its oil production was up 35 percent in full-year 1996, while average natural gas production rose 72 percent from 1995.
Oil production in 1996 averaged 34,520 barrels per day, while average natural gas production per day was 469.4 million cubic feet per day.
The company has increased its exploration and development budget for 1997 to $393 million, up 68 percent from the 1996 figure.
